message.entry: Dumping Core for previous X error... Bye

Connection to the X11 Display Server ({0}) has been lost.
No more graphics windows can be displayed in this session.
Graphics Objects can still be printed, and all commands should still work.
Consider saving your current session and exiting.
Unable to open display ''{0}''. You will not be able to display graphics on the screen.
X Server failed to allocate enough memory for some previous MATLAB graphics or window request
